question: Name two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania.
true_answer: Galvė Lake and Lukos Lake (also known as Bernardinų Lake).
asked_question_translated: Cite dois lagos notáveis que rodeiam Trakai, na Lituânia.
answer: Os dois lagos notáveis que rodeiam Trakai, na Lituânia, são o Lago Galvė e o Lago Bernardinų (Bernardinai).
answer_translated_eng: The two notable lakes surrounding Trakai in Lithuania are Lake Galvė and Lake Bernardinų (Bernardinai).
